definition: feeling or showing pleasure or contentment
sentence: She felt happy when she received the good news.
The view from the mountain was absolutely wonderful.

definition: pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically
sentence: The garden was filled with beautiful flowers.
The artist created an exquisite painting that captivated everyone.

definition: the occurrence of events by chance in a happy way
sentence: Finding that old photograph was a stroke of serendipity.

definition: showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise
sentence: She was meticulous in her research, leaving no stone unturned.

definition: representing the most perfect or typical example of a quality or class
sentence: He is the quintessential gentleman, always polite and well-dressed.

definition: lasting for a very short time
sentence: The beauty of the sunset was ephemeral, fading into darkness quickly.
The villain had a nefarious plan to take over the city.

definition: a harsh, discordant mixture of sounds
sentence: The cacophony of the city streets made it hard to concentrate.
